35 template<typename weight_t>
36 bitpit::OBinaryStream& operator<<(bitpit::OBinaryStream &buffer, const bitpit::DiscreteStencil<weight_t> &stencil)
37 {
38  buffer << stencil.m_zero;
39 
40  std::size_t nItems = stencil.size();
41  buffer << nItems;
42 
43  const long *patternData = stencil.patternData();
44  const weight_t *weightData = stencil.weightData();
45  for (std::size_t n = 0; n < nItems; ++n) {
46  buffer << patternData[n];
47  buffer << weightData[n];
48  }
49 
50  buffer << stencil.m_constant;
51 
52  return buffer;
53 }
54 
62 template<typename weight_t>
63 bitpit::IBinaryStream& operator>>(bitpit::IBinaryStream &buffer, bitpit::DiscreteStencil<weight_t> &stencil)
64 {
65  buffer >> stencil.m_zero;
66 
67  std::size_t nItems;
68  buffer >> nItems;
69 
70  stencil.resize(nItems);
71  long *patternData = stencil.patternData();
72  weight_t *weightData = stencil.weightData();
73  for (std::size_t n = 0; n < nItems; ++n) {
74  buffer >> patternData[n];
75  buffer >> weightData[n];
76  }
77 
78  buffer >> stencil.m_constant;
79 
80  return buffer;
81 }

90 template<typename weight_t>
91 DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::DiscreteStencil(const weight_t &zero)
92  : DiscreteStencil(0, zero)
93 {
94 }

102 template<typename weight_t>
103 DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::DiscreteStencil(std::size_t size, const weight_t &zero)
104  : m_zero(zero),
105  m_pattern(size, -1), m_weights(size, m_zero),
106  m_constant(m_zero)
107 {
108 }
109 
117 template<typename weight_t>
118 DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::DiscreteStencil(std::size_t size, const long *pattern, const weight_t &zero)
119  : m_zero(zero),
120  m_pattern(pattern, pattern + size), m_weights(size, m_zero),
121  m_constant(m_zero)
122 {
123 }
124 
133 template<typename weight_t>
134 DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::DiscreteStencil(std::size_t size, const long *pattern, const weight_t *weights, const weight_t &zero)
135  : m_zero(zero),
136  m_pattern(pattern, pattern + size), m_weights(weights, weights + size),
137  m_constant(m_zero)
138 {
139 }
140 
147 template<typename weight_t>
148 void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::initialize(std::size_t size, const weight_t &zero)
149 {
150  rawCopyValue(zero, &m_zero);
151 
152  resize(size);
153  for (std::size_t n = 0; n < size; ++n) {
154  m_pattern[n] = -1;
155  rawCopyValue(m_zero, m_weights.data() + n);
156  }
157 
158  zeroConstant();
159 }
160 
168 template<typename weight_t>
169 void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::initialize(std::size_t size, const long *pattern, const weight_t &zero)
170 {
171  rawCopyValue(zero, &m_zero);
172 
173  resize(size);
174  for (std::size_t n = 0; n < size; ++n) {
175  m_pattern[n] = pattern[n];
176  rawCopyValue(m_zero, m_weights.data() + n);
177  }
178 
179  zeroConstant();
180 }
181 
190 template<typename weight_t>
191 void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::initialize(std::size_t size, const long *pattern, const weight_t *weights, const weight_t &zero)
192 {
193  rawCopyValue(zero, &m_zero);
194 
195  resize(size);
196  for (std::size_t n = 0; n < size; ++n) {
197  m_pattern[n] = pattern[n];
198  rawCopyValue(weights[n], m_weights.data() + n);
199  }
200 
201  zeroConstant();
202 }
203 
210 template<typename weight_t>
211 void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::initialize(const DiscreteStencil<weight_t> &other)
212 {
213  rawCopyValue(other.m_zero, &m_zero);
214 
215  std::size_t nItems = other.size();
216  resize(nItems);
217  for (std::size_t n = 0; n < nItems; ++n) {
218  m_pattern[n] = other.m_pattern[n];
219  rawCopyValue(other.m_weights[n], m_weights.data() + n);
220  }
221 
222  setConstant(other.m_constant);
223 }
224 
230 template<typename weight_t>
231 std::size_t DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::size() const
232 {
233  return m_pattern.size();
234 }
235 
241 template<typename weight_t>
242 void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::resize(std::size_t size)
243 {
244  m_pattern.resize(size, -1);
245  m_weights.resize(size, m_zero);
246 }
247 
256 template<typename weight_t>
257 void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::reserve(std::size_t capacity)
258 {
259  m_pattern.reserve(capacity);
260  m_weights.reserve(capacity);
261 }

374 template<typename weight_t>
375 void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::setWeight(std::size_t pos, const weight_t &weight)
376 {
377  m_weights[pos] = weight;
378 }

386 template<typename weight_t>
387 void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::setWeight(std::size_t pos, weight_t &&weight)
388 {
389  m_weights[pos] = std::move(weight);
390 }
391 
398 template<typename weight_t>
399 void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::sumWeight(std::size_t pos, const weight_t &value)
400 {
401  m_weights[pos] += value;
402 }

409 template<typename weight_t>
410 void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::zeroWeight(std::size_t pos)
411 {
412  rawCopyValue(m_zero, m_weights.data() + pos);
413 }

422 template<typename weight_t>
423 void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::setItem(std::size_t pos, long id, const weight_t &weight)
424 {
425  setPattern(pos, id);
426  setWeight(pos, weight);
427 }
428 
436 template<typename weight_t>
437 void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::setItem(std::size_t pos, long id, weight_t &&weight)
438 {
439  setPattern(pos, id);
440  setWeight(pos, std::move(weight));
441 }
442 
452 template<typename weight_t>
453 void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::sumItem(long id, const weight_t &value)
454 {
455  weight_t *weight = findWeight(id);
456  if (weight) {
457  *weight += value;
458  } else {
459  appendItem(id, value);
460  }
461 }
462 
472 template<typename weight_t>
473 void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::appendItem(long id, const weight_t &weight)
474 {
475  m_pattern.push_back(id);
476  m_weights.push_back(weight);
477 }
478 
488 template<typename weight_t>
489 void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::appendItem(long id, weight_t &&weight)
490 {
491  m_pattern.push_back(id);
492  m_weights.push_back(std::move(weight));
493 }
494 
500 template<typename weight_t>
501 const weight_t & DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::getConstant() const
502 {
503  return m_constant;
504 }

511 template<typename weight_t>
512 weight_t & DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::getConstant()
513 {
514  return m_constant;
515 }
516 
522 template<typename weight_t>
523 void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::setConstant(const weight_t &value)
524 {
525  rawCopyValue(value, &m_constant);
526 }
527 
533 template<typename weight_t>
534 void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::setConstant(weight_t &&value)
535 {
536  rawMoveValue(std::move(value), &m_constant);
537 }
538 
544 template<typename weight_t>
545 void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::sumConstant(const weight_t &value)
546 {
547  m_constant += value;
548 }
549 
553 template<typename weight_t>
554 void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::zeroConstant()
555 {
556  rawCopyValue(m_zero, &m_constant);
557 }
558 
569 template<typename weight_t>
570 void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::clear(bool release)
571 {
572  m_pattern.clear();
573  m_weights.clear();
574 
575  if (release) {
576  m_pattern.shrink_to_fit();
577  m_weights.shrink_to_fit();
578  }
579 
580  zeroConstant();
581 }
582 
588 template<typename weight_t>
589 void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::optimize(double tolerance)
590 {
591  std::size_t nItems = size();
592  for (std::size_t n = 0; n < nItems; ++n) {
593  bool isWeightNeglibile = optimizeWeight(n, tolerance);
594  if (isWeightNeglibile) {
595  m_pattern.erase(m_pattern.begin() + n);
596  m_weights.erase(m_weights.begin() + n);
597  --n;
598  --nItems;
599  }
600  }
601 }
602 
608 template<typename weight_t>
609 void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::renumber(const std::unordered_map<long, long> &map)
610 {
611  const std::size_t nItems = size();
612  for (std::size_t n = 0; n < nItems; ++n) {
613  long &id = m_pattern[n];
614  id = map.at(id);
615  }
616 }
617 
623 template<typename weight_t>
624 void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::addComplementToZero(long id)
625 {
626  const std::size_t nItems = size();
627  if (nItems == 0) {
628  return;
629  }
630 
631  weight_t complement = -1. * m_weights[0];
632  for (std::size_t n = 1; n < nItems; ++n) {
633  complement -= m_weights[n];
634  }
635 
636  appendItem(id, complement);
637 }
638 
642 template<typename weight_t>
643 void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::zero()
644 {
645  const std::size_t nItems = size();
646  for (std::size_t n = 0; n < nItems; ++n) {
647  weight_t &weight = m_weights[n];
648  rawCopyValue(m_zero, &weight);
649  }
650 
651  setConstant(m_zero);
652 }
660 template<typename weight_t>
661 bool DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::optimizeWeight(std::size_t pos, double tolerance)
662 {
663  return (std::abs(m_weights[pos] - m_zero) <= tolerance);
664 }
665 
673 template<typename weight_t>
674 weight_t * DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::findWeight(long id)
675 {
676  const std::size_t nItems = size();
677  for (std::size_t n = 0; n < nItems; ++n) {
678  if (m_pattern[n] == id) {
679  return (m_weights.data() + n);
680  }
681  }
682 
683  return nullptr;
684 }
685 
693 template<typename weight_t>
694 const weight_t * DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::findWeight(long id) const
695 {
696  const std::size_t nItems = size();
697  for (std::size_t n = 0; n < nItems; ++n) {
698  if (m_pattern[n] == id) {
699  return (m_weights.data() + n);
700  }
701  }
702 
703  return nullptr;
704 }
705 
712 template<typename weight_t>
713 void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::rawCopyValue(const weight_t &source, weight_t *target)
714 {
715  *target = source;
716 }
717 
724 template<typename weight_t>
725 void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::rawMoveValue(weight_t &&source, weight_t *target)
726 {
727  *target = std::move(source);
728 }
729 
736 template<typename weight_t>
737 void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::display(std::ostream &out, double factor) const
738 {
739  const std::size_t nItems = size();
740 
741  weight_t sum = m_zero;
742  for (std::size_t n = 0; n < nItems; ++n) {
743  long id = m_pattern[n];
744  weight_t value = factor * m_weights[n];
745  out << " id: " << id << " weight: " << value << std::endl;
746  sum += value;
747  }
748 
749  out << " constant : " << (factor * m_constant) << std::endl;
750  out << " sum : " << sum << std::endl;
751 }
752 
758 template<typename weight_t>
759 size_t DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::getBinarySize() const
760 {
761  std::size_t nItems = size();
762 
763  return (sizeof(m_zero) + nItems * (sizeof(long) + sizeof(weight_t)) + sizeof(m_constant));
764 }
765 
772 template<typename weight_t>
773 DiscreteStencil<weight_t> & DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::operator*=(double factor)
774 {
775  const std::size_t nItems = size();
776  for (std::size_t n = 0; n < nItems; ++n) {
777  m_weights[n] *= factor;
778  }
779  m_constant *= factor;
780 
781  return *this;
782 }
783 
790 template<typename weight_t>
791 DiscreteStencil<weight_t> & DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::operator/=(double factor)
792 {
793  const std::size_t nItems = size();
794  for (std::size_t n = 0; n < nItems; ++n) {
795  m_weights[n] /= factor;
796  }
797  m_constant /= factor;
798 
799  return *this;
800 }
801 
808 template<typename weight_t>
809 DiscreteStencil<weight_t> & DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::operator+=(const DiscreteStencil<weight_t> &other)
810 {
811  const std::size_t other_nItems = other.size();
812  for (std::size_t n = 0; n < other_nItems; ++n) {
813  sumItem(other.m_pattern[n], other.m_weights[n]);
814  }
815 
816  m_constant += other.m_constant;
817 
818  return *this;
819 }
820 
827 template<typename weight_t>
828 DiscreteStencil<weight_t> & DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::operator-=(const DiscreteStencil<weight_t> &other)
829 {
830  const std::size_t other_nItems = other.size();
831  for (std::size_t n = 0; n < other_nItems; ++n) {
832  sumItem(other.m_pattern[n], -1. * other.m_weights[n]);
833  }
834 
835  m_constant -= other.m_constant;
836 
837  return *this;
838 }
839 
840 }
841 
849 template<typename weight_t>
850 bitpit::DiscreteStencil<weight_t> operator*(const bitpit::DiscreteStencil<weight_t> &stencil, double factor)
851 {
852  return (factor * stencil);
853 }

862 template<typename weight_t>
863 bitpit::DiscreteStencil<weight_t> operator*(double factor, const bitpit::DiscreteStencil<weight_t> &stencil)
864 {
865  bitpit::DiscreteStencil<weight_t> stencil_result(stencil);
866  stencil_result *= factor;
867 
868  return stencil_result;
869 }
870 
878 template<typename weight_t>
879 bitpit::DiscreteStencil<weight_t> operator/(const bitpit::DiscreteStencil<weight_t> &stencil, double factor)
880 {
881  bitpit::DiscreteStencil<weight_t> stencil_result(stencil);
882  stencil_result /= factor;
883 
884  return stencil_result;
885 }

894 template<typename weight_t>
895 bitpit::DiscreteStencil<weight_t> operator+(const bitpit::DiscreteStencil<weight_t> &stencil_A, const bitpit::DiscreteStencil<weight_t> &stencil_B)
896 {
897  bitpit::DiscreteStencil<weight_t> stencil_result(stencil_A);
898  stencil_result += stencil_B;
899 
900  return stencil_result;
901 }
902 
910 template<typename weight_t>
911 bitpit::DiscreteStencil<weight_t> operator-(const bitpit::DiscreteStencil<weight_t> &stencil_A, const bitpit::DiscreteStencil<weight_t> &stencil_B)
912 {
913  bitpit::DiscreteStencil<weight_t> stencil_result(stencil_A);
914  stencil_result -= stencil_B;
915 
916  return stencil_result;
917 }
